mean_cn: n. 个人主义；不干涉主义
mean_en: the quality of being different from other people and doing things in your own way
sentence: His strong sense of individualism kept him from joining the rest of the crowd.
sentence_trans: 他强烈的个人主义使他没有加入其他人。
word_etyma: individual个人的 + ism……主义 → 与他人分开的 → 个人主义；利己主义；个人特征
